page.title: 20Interesting People
page.content: {MRS BALL THE POST MISTRESS MRS BALL HAS BEEN THE POST MISTRESS SINCE 1949.SHE HAS BECOME A WELL KNOWN AND LIKED PERSON WHO ALWAYS KNOWS WHAT IS HAPPENING IN THE VILLAGE.HER FAMILY LIVE NEXT DOOR TO THE POST OFFICE AND INCLUDES HER GRAND DAUGHTER WHO ATTENDS THE LOCAL SCHOOL.SHE FEELS THAT HERS IS A VITAL JOB FOR THE VILLAGE,HELPING ALL KINDS OF PEOPLE AND SHE LIKES TO TALK TO EVERYONE, YOUNG AND OLD ALIKE.IN HER TIME SHE HAS ONLY EVER HAD ONE AWKWARD CUSTOMER. PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE HAVE ALWAYS BEEN PLEASANT TO HER. THE PEOPLE THAT HAVE MOVED INTO THE VILLAGE WHEN THE NEW HOUSES WERE PUT UP HAVE BROUGHT LOTS OF NEW LIFE..SHE HOPES TO CARRY ON WITH THE JOB FOR MANY YEARS TO COME.
